verses.verse: <S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> You <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because the <S%H341>enemy<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> against <S%H1889>you,<s%> Aha! <S%H5769>and,<s%> The ancient high <S%H1116>places<s%> are ours in <S%H4181>possession;<s%>

therefore <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H8074>Because,<s%> even because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you <S%H7602>up<s%> on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> that you might be a <S%H4181>possession<s%> to the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and you are taken <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H3956>talkers,<s%> and the evil <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%>

<S%H2022>therefore,<s%> you mountains of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> to the <S%H650>watercourses<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> to the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H2723>wastes<s%> and to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> which are become a <S%H957>prey<s%> and <S%H3933>derision<s%> to the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are all <S%H5439>around;<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> Surely in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%> against the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and against all <S%H123>Edom,<s%> that have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%> to themselves for a <S%H4181>possession<s%> with the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of all their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> with <S%H7589>despite<s%> of <S%H3824>soul,<s%> to cast it <S%H4054>out<s%> for a <S%H957>prey.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> concerning the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> to the <S%H650>watercourses<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1696>Behold,<s%> I have spoken in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> and in my <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> because you have <S%H5375>borne<s%> the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations:<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> I <S%H5375>have<s%> <S%H3027>sworn,<s%> <S%H1471>saying,<s%> Surely the nations that are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H5375>you,<s%> they shall bear their <S%H3639>shame.<s%>

But <S%H2022>you,<s%> mountains of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you shall shoot <S%H5414>forth<s%> your <S%H6057>branches,<s%> and <S%H5375>yield<s%> your <S%H6529>fruit<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for they are at <S%H7126>hand<s%> to <S%H935>come.<s%>
<S%H6437>For,<s%> behold, I am for you, and I will turn into <S%H5647>you,<s%> and you shall be tilled and <S%H2232>sown;<s%>

and I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> on <S%H1004>you,<s%> all the house of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even all of <S%H5892>it;<s%> and the cities shall be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> and the <S%H2723>waste<s%> places shall be <S%H1129>built;<s%>

and I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> on you <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal;<s%> and they shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> and be <S%H6509>fruitful;<s%> and I will cause you to be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> after your former <S%H6927>estate,<s%> and will do <S%H2895>better<s%> to you than at your <S%H7221>beginnings:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H120>Yes,<s%> I will cause men to <S%H3212>walk<s%> on <S%H5971>you,<s%> even my people <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5159>you,<s%> and you shall be their inheritance, and you shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> henceforth bereave them of <S%H7921>children.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because they <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H398>you,<s%> You are a devourer of <S%H120>men,<s%> and have been a <S%H7921>bereaver<s%> of your <S%H1471>nation;<s%>
therefore you shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> no <S%H7921>more,<s%> neither bereave your <S%H1471>nation<s%> any <S%H5002>more,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh;<s%>

neither will I let you <S%H8085>hear<s%> any more the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> neither shall you <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> any <S%H1471>more,<s%> neither shall you cause your nation to <S%H3782>stumble<s%> any <S%H5002>more,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> when the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in their own <S%H127>land,<s%> they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> it by their <S%H1870>way<s%> and by their <S%H5949>doings:<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me was as the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of a woman in her <S%H5079>impurity.<s%>

Therefore I <S%H8210>poured<s%> out my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on them for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> which they had <S%H8210>poured<s%> out on the <S%H776>land,<s%> and because they had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> it with their <S%H1544>idols;<s%>

and I <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and they were <S%H2219>dispersed<s%> through the <S%H776>countries:<s%> according to their <S%H1870>way<s%> and according to their <S%H5949>doings<s%> I judged <S%H8199>them.<s%>

When they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> where they <S%H935>went,<s%> they <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%> in that men <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H5971>them,<s%> These are the people of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and are gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>

But I had <S%H2550>respect<s%> for my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> which the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> where they <S%H935>went.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> I <S%H6213>don't<s%> do this for your <S%H1004>sake,<s%> house of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but for my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> which you have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> where you <S%H935>went.<s%>

I will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> which has been <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> which you have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst;<s%> and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in you before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

For I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you from <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of all the <S%H776>countries,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into your own <S%H127>land.<s%>

I will <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> on <S%H2891>you,<s%> and you shall be clean: from all your <S%H2932>filthiness,<s%> and from all your <S%H1544>idols,<s%> will I cleanse <S%H2891>you.<s%>

I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H5493>you;<s%> and I will take away the <S%H68>stony<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> out of your <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> and cause you to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and do <S%H6213>them.<s%>
You shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and you shall be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be your <S%H430>God.<s%>

I will <S%H3467>save<s%> you from all your <S%H2932>uncleanness:<s%> and I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> and will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5414>it,<s%> and lay no famine on <S%H7458>you.<s%>

I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and the <S%H8570>increase<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that you may <S%H3947>receive<s%> no more the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Then you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings<s%> that were not <S%H2896>good;<s%> and you shall <S%H6962>loathe<s%> yourselves in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and for your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

Nor for your sake <S%H6213>do<s%> I <S%H5002>this,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> be it <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H954>you:<s%> be ashamed and <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> you from all your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> I will cause the <S%H5892>cities<s%> to be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> and the <S%H2723>waste<s%> places shall be <S%H1129>built.<s%>
The <S%H776>land<s%> that was <S%H8074>desolate<s%> shall be <S%H5647>tilled,<s%> whereas it was a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all who passed <S%H5674>by.<s%>

They shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1977>This<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> that was <S%H8074>desolate<s%> has become like the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden;<s%> and the <S%H2720>waste<s%> and <S%H8074>desolate<s%> and <S%H2040>ruined<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1219>fortified<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>

Then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H2040>ruined<s%> <S%H5193>places,<s%> and planted that which was <S%H8074>desolate:<s%> <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H6213>it,<s%> and I will do it.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> For <S%H1875>this,<s%> moreover, will I be inquired of by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it for <S%H7235>them:<s%> I will increase them with <S%H120>men<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

As the <S%H6629>flock<s%> for <S%H6944>sacrifice,<s%> as the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in her appointed <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> so shall the <S%H2720>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> be <S%H4392>filled<s%> with <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H120>men;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
